name: As Above, So Below (Eric Sexton, Jamac, BigSpence)
name_original: As Above, So Below (Eric Sexton, Jamac, BigSpence)
description:
A gravity-bending puzzle game where the ceiling is just as important as the floor. Plan everything from the floor to work on both platforms.

Global Game Jam Submission: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/above-so-below-5
